original_text: Sallu's relatives, Gabbai and Sallai were also there. There were 928 men from Benjamin's tribe.
korean_text: 그 다음은 갑배와 살래 등이니 모두 구백이십팔 명이라

sentences.original_text: Sallu's relatives, Gabbai and Sallai were also there.
sentences.korean_translation: 살루의 친척인 가바이와 살라이도 그곳에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There were 928 men from Benjamin's tribe.
